TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PrincipalPermission extends System.Object implements class System.Security.IPermission, class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class PrincipalPermission Implements IPermission, IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class PrincipalPermission sealed : System::Security::IPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 允許使用為宣告式和命令式安全性動作所定義的語言建構，對使用中的主體進行檢查 (請參閱 )。

span.span: Allows checks against the active principal (see ) using the language constructs defined for both declarative and imperative security actions.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將身分識別資訊 （使用者名稱和角色） 傳遞到建構函式，可用來要求的作用中的主體身分識別符合這項資訊。By passing identity information (user name and role) to the constructor, can be used to demand that the identity of the active principal matches this information. 要比對使用中以及相關聯，必須符合指定的識別和角色。To match the active and associated , both the specified identity and role must match. 如果`null`識別字串，則將它解譯為要比對任何身分識別的要求。If `null` identity string is used, it is interpreted as a request to match any identity. 使用`null`角色字串會符合任何角色。Use of `null` role string will match any role. 也就是說，傳遞`null`參數`name`或`role`至會比對身分識別與任何角色。By implication, passing `null` parameter for `name` or `role` to will match the identity and roles in any . 也可以建構，只會決定是否代表已驗證或未驗證的實體。It is also possible to construct a that only determines whether the represents an authenticated or unauthenticated entity. 在此情況下，`name`和`role`都會被忽略。In this case, `name` and `role` are ignored. 不像其他大部分的權限，不會延伸。Unlike most other permissions, does not extend . 不過，它會實作介面。It does, however, implement the interface. 這是因為不是程式碼存取權限; 亦即，並未具備根據執行的組件的識別。This is because is not a code access permission; that is, it is not granted based on the identity of the executing assembly. 相反地，它可讓程式碼來執行動作 (， ，等等) 比對目前的使用者識別的方式有一致的方式執行這些動作的程式碼存取和程式碼識別權限。Instead, it allows code to perform actions (, , , and so on) against the current user identity in a manner consistent with the way those actions are performed for code access and code identity permissions. > [!IMPORTANT] > 主體的權限的要求之前就必須將目前的應用程式定義域的主要原則設定為列舉值。Prior to a demand for principal permission it is necessary to set the current application domain's principal policy to the enumeration value . 根據預設，主要原則設定為。By default, the principal policy is set to . 如果您沒有設定主體的原則，主體的權限的要求將會失敗。If you do not set the principal policy to , a demand for principal permission will fail. 要求主體的使用權限之前，應先執行下列程式碼：The following code should be executed before the principal permission is demanded: > > `AppDomain.CurrentDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy(PrincipalPolicy.WindowsPrincipal).` ## Examples 下列範例需要使用中的主體是系統管理員。The following example requires the active principal to be an administrator. `name`參數是`null`，可讓任何使用者都是傳遞要求系統管理員。The `name` parameter is `null`, which enables any user who is an administrator to pass the demand. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行需要您是系統管理員的程式碼，您必須先將權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that requires you to be an administrator, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. [!code-cpp[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `None` 符合未驗證的主體 (為空字串 ("")，而不，是`false`)。`None` matches only the unauthenticated principal ( is the empty string (""), no , is `false`). `Unrestricted` 比對所有主體 (是`null`，是`null`)。`Unrestricted` matches all principals ( is `null`, is `null`). > [!NOTE] > 這個建構函式是為了與其他權限，設計的一致性，但不是有用的作法。This constructor is included for consistency with the design of other permissions, but is not useful in practice.

span.span: The parameter is not a valid .

summary.span: 為指定的 和 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這兩個`name`參數和`role`參數必須符合針對這個權限，以符合作用中以及相關聯。Both the `name` parameter and the `role` parameter must match for this permission to match the active and associated . 設定`name`至`null`來檢查是否有任何使用者角色中。Set `name` to `null` to check for any user in a role. ## Examples 下列範例需要使用中的主體是系統管理員。The following example requires the active principal to be an administrator. `name`參數是`null`，可讓任何使用者都是傳遞要求系統管理員。The `name` parameter is `null`, which enables any user who is an administrator to pass the demand. **請注意**Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。**Note** In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行需要您是系統管理員的程式碼，您必須先將權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that requires you to be an administrator, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. [!code-cpp[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrincipalPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Copy() cil managed

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 權限的複本與原始的權限，表示相同的主體和身分識別。A copy of the permission represents the same principal and identity as the original permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Demand() cil managed

summary.span: 在執行階段判斷目前的主體是否符合目前權限所指定的主體。

span.span: Determines at run time whether the current principal matches the principal specified by the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有就會引發成功。If no is raised, succeeds. 這個方法會根據附加至呼叫端執行緒的主體。This method acts against the principal attached to the calling thread. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在呼叫之前方法，您就需要將目前的應用程式定義域的主要原則設定為列舉值。Prior to calling the method, it is necessary to set the current application domain's principal policy to the enumeration value . 根據預設主體的原則設定為。By default the principal policy is set to . 如果您沒有設定主體的原則，主體的權限的要求將會失敗。If you do not set the principal policy to , a demand for principal permission will fail. 要求主體的使用權限，就會發生之前，應先執行下列程式碼：The following code should be executed before the demand for principal permission occurs: > > `AppDomain.CurrentDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy(PrincipalPolicy.WindowsPrincipal).`

exception.span: 目前的主體未通過目前權限所指定之主體的安全性檢查。

span.span: The current principal does not pass the security check for the principal specified by the current permission.
-or-
The current is .

Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 取得 物件的雜湊碼，其適合用於雜湊表這類的雜湊演算法和資料結構。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相同的權限的兩個執行個體的雜湊程式碼可能會不同，因此雜湊程式碼不應比較兩個物件。The hash code for two instances of the same permission might be different, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two objects.

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限將為 。

span.span: This new permission will be if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個使用者永遠不會交集，因為這個方法不是適用於。Because two users never intersect, this method is not useful for . 例如，套用至物件的For example, [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/vb/remarks.vb#1)] 相當於is equivalent to [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cpp/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cs/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/vb/remarks.vb#2)] 由於 Bob 和路易斯公主和，同時可表示任何身分識別。because no identity can simultaneously represent both Bob and Louise. 實際上，`pp1.Demand()`才會成功未經驗證的主體 (名稱等於空字串 ("")) 可以做為系統管理員角色。In effect, `pp1.Demand()` only succeeds if an unauthenticated principal (with name equal to the empty string ("")) is allowed to act in the Administrator role.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，並且不是與目前使用權限相同類別的執行個體。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果順利完成目前的權限的所有要求所指定權限也會都成功，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if all demands that succeed for the current permission also succeed for the specified permission. ## Examples 下列範例會定義的執行個體對應至三個不同的使用者。The following example defines instances of corresponding to three distinct users. 使用者群組然後會建立兩個額外的執行個體。Two additional instances are then created as groups of users. `pp1` 代表 Bob 和路易斯公主和，`pp2`表示 Bob，路易斯公主和，Greg。`pp1` represents Bob and Louise, `pp2` represents Bob, Louise, and Greg. [!code-cpp[Classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PrincipalPermission.IsSubsetOf Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 上述宣告中，與`pp1.IsSubsetOf(pp2)`傳回`true`，和`pp2.IsSubsetOf(pp1)`傳回`false`。With the preceding declarations, `pp1.IsSubsetOf(pp2)` returns `true`, and `pp2.IsSubsetOf(pp1)` returns `false`.

exception.span: 參數是一個物件，沒有與目前使用權限相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is an object that is not of the same type as the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制符合任何主體。An unrestricted matches any principal.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission other) cil managed
Public Function Union (other As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立表示準則的一組給定的個別權限物件。 creates a permission representing the criteria of a given set of individual objects. 它可用於簡潔代表一組測試的條件。It is useful for compactly representing a set of conditions to test. 例如，使用宣告For example, with the declarations [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cpp/remarks.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/cs/remarks.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.PrincipalPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.permissions.principalpermission/vb/remarks.vb#3)] `(ppBob.Union(ppLouise)).Demand()` 如果目前的主體中的系統管理員角色中的系統管理員或路易斯公主和角色代表 Bob 會成功。`(ppBob.Union(ppLouise)).Demand()` will succeed if the current principal represents Bob in the role of Administrator or Louise in the role of Administrator.

exception.span: 參數是一個物件，沒有與目前使用權限相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is an object that is not of the same type as the current permission.
